name: Room 13
description:
You are inside an endless hotel but there is a way you can escape. Search in the hallways of the hotel and find the changes within them to reach Room 13.
If you find anomalies, turn around!
If you think the room is normal continue to the exit.
To get to Room 13.
Room 13 is a small walking simulator inspired by the backrooms and liminal spaces.


-Endless Hotel
-7 Shaders
-30+ Anomalies


This experience can last up to 15 - 60 minutes
It can last longer if you playthrough the game with the different shaders and if find all of the anomalies.
